info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 23 at 1:57PM MDT until April 25 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM MONDAY TO 6 AM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 5 inches, with higher amounts above pass level. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Elkhorn and Boulder Mountains and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...From 6 PM Monday to 6 AM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Isolated power outages possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
